reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 22/05: INVESTIGATIONS RELATING TO ACTS
reg_info.act_under: Ministry of Consumer and Business Services Act

content.content: 1. The following Acts are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 5.1 (1) of the Act: 1. Bailiffs Act. 2. Cemeteries Act (Revised). 3. Collection Agencies Act. 4. Consumer Protection Act, 2002. 5. Consumer Reporting Act. 6. Discriminatory Business Practices Act. 7. Paperback and Periodical Distributors Act. 8. Theatres Act. O. Reg. 22/05, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following Acts are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 5.1 (1) of the Act:

1. Bailiffs Act.

2. Cemeteries Act (Revised).

3. Collection Agencies Act.

4. Consumer Protection Act, 2002.

5. Consumer Reporting Act.

6. Discriminatory Business Practices Act.

7. Paperback and Periodical Distributors Act.

8. Theatres Act. O. Reg. 22/05, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 22/05, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 22/05, s. 2.

Français
